item.title: NBA-Shotchart
item.description: An interactive dashboard for NBA player shot data. Note: currently under maintaince as NBA has imposed CORS restrictions that prevent the package from being used in a browser directly Work Summary Built and deployed a dashboard using React JS, D3 and Ant Design to visualize NBA players’ shot performance Improved user experience by adding 4 data filters and an autocomplete search bar providing player image preview

item.title: Tweety Pipe
item.description: A real-time data processor built with Spark and Kafka. Data visualized with a simple Flask app and Chart.js Work Summary Implemented a real-time data processor with Spark and Flask to visualize trending Twitter hashtags Designed and implemented a real-time sentiment monitor with Kafka, processing 3500 Tweets per minute Visualized results with Ajax and Chart.js for 1% of all public Tweets Technologies involved: Python, Spark, Kafka, Flask, Google Compute Engine, Twitter API

item.title: Projects
item.description: Tweety-Pipe: A Real-Time Data Processor with Spark and Kafka NBA-Shortchart: An Interactive Visualization Dashboard for NBA player Shot Data AFK, grabbing lunch, more to come!

item.title: Education
item.description: -- Vanderbilt University Master of Science (May 2023) Major: Computer Science University of Toronto, St. George Honours Bachelor of Science (June 2021) Specialist: Computer Science, Minors: Statistics, Math Upper-level CS GPA: 3.86/4.0 Final two-year GPA: 3.92/4.0 Courses include: Operating Systems, Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Deep Learning & Neural Networks, Statistical ML, Mobile Robotics, Image Understanding, Algorithms & Data Structures, Programming Languages, Parallel Programming

item.title: Work
item.description: -- Activision Blizzard - Demonware Demonware is an Activision Blizzard studio that provides online web services for some of the world’s largest video game franchises. Demonware’s services include matchmaking, in-game purchase, social networking and many more, impacting almost half a billion players’ online gameplay experience. Software Engineering Intern Call of Duty Modern Warfare, Warzone, Black Ops Cold War (WATCH THE TRAILER) 05/2020 – 08/2020 Toronto, ON Wrote scalable distributed web services in Python for major titles with 75+ of millions of players, deploying and troubleshooting in containerized live environments using Docker, Kubernetes and Jenkins.
